verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Command <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> that they put out <WH7971> of the camp <WH4264> every leper, <WH6879> and everyone who has an issue, <WH2100> and whoever is unclean <WH2931> by the dead. <WH5315>

Both you shall put <WH7971> male <WH2145> and female <WH5347> outside <WH2351> of <WH7971> the camp; <WH4264> that they not defile <WH2930> their camp, <WH4264> in the midst <WH8432> of which <WH834> I dwell. <WH7931>"

The children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did so, <WH6213> and put them out <WH7971> outside <WH2351> of the camp; <WH4264> as Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> so did <WH6213> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> <WH376> 'When a man or woman <WH802> commits <WH6213> any sin <WH2403> that men <WH120> commit, <WH6213> so as to trespass <WH4604> against Yahweh, <WH3068> and that soul <WH5315> is guilty; <WH816>

then he shall confess <WH3034> his sin <WH2403> which he has done, <WH6213> and he shall make restitution <WH7725> for his guilt <WH817> in full, <WH7218> and add <WH3254> to it the fifth <WH2549> part of it, <WH5414> and give it to him in respect of whom he has been guilty. <WH816>

But if the man <WH376> has no kinsman <WH1350> to whom restitution <WH7725> may be made for the guilt, <WH817> the restitution <WH7725> for guilt <WH817> which is made to Yahweh <WH3068> shall be the priest <WH3548>'s; besides the ram <WH352> of the atonement, <WH3725> by which atonement shall be made for him. <WH3722>
Every heave offering <WH8641> of all the holy things <WH6944> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> which they present <WH7126> to the priest, <WH3548> shall be his.
Every man <WH376>'s holy things <WH6944> shall be his: <WH376> whatever any man gives <WH5414> the priest, <WH3548> it shall be his.'"
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
"Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and tell <WH559> them: <WH376> 'If any man <WH376>'s wife <WH802> goes astray, <WH7847> and is <WH4603> unfaithful to him, <WH4604>

and a man <WH376> lies <WH7901> with her carnally, <WH7902> and it is hidden <WH5956> from the eyes <WH5869> of her husband, <WH376> and is kept close, <WH5641> and she is defiled, <WH2930> and there is no witness <WH5707> against her, <WH8610> and she isn't taken in the act;

and the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> comes <WH5674> on him, <WH7065> and he is jealous of his wife, <WH802> and she is defiled: <WH2930> or if the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> comes <WH5674> on him, <WH7065> and he is jealous of his wife, <WH802> and she isn't <WH2930> defiled:

then the man <WH376> shall bring <WH935> his wife <WH802> to the priest, <WH3548> and shall bring <WH935> her offering <WH7133> for her: <WH6224> the tenth part of an ephah <WH374> of barley <WH8184> meal. <WH7058> He shall pour <WH3332> no oil <WH8081> on it, <WH5414> nor put frankincense <WH3828> on it, <WH4503> for it is a meal offering of jealousy, <WH7068> a meal offering <WH4503> of memorial, <WH2146> bringing <WH2142> iniquity <WH5771> to memory. <WH2142>
The priest <WH3548> shall bring her near, <WH7126> and set <WH5975> her before <WH6440> Yahweh; <WH3068>

and the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> holy <WH6918> water <WH4325> in an earthen <WH2789> vessel; <WH3627> and of the dust <WH6083> that is on the floor <WH7172> of the tabernacle <WH4908> the priest <WH3548> shall take, <WH3947> and put <WH5414> it into the water. <WH4325>

The priest <WH3548> shall set <WH5975> the woman <WH802> before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> and let the hair of the woman <WH802>'s head <WH7218> go loose, <WH6544> and put <WH5414> the meal offering <WH4503> of memorial <WH2146> in her hands, <WH3709> which is the meal offering <WH4503> of jealousy. <WH7068> The priest <WH3548> shall have in his hand <WH3027> the water <WH4325> of bitterness <WH4751> that brings a curse. <WH779>

The priest <WH3548> shall cause her to swear, <WH7650> and shall tell <WH559> the woman, <WH802> "If no man <WH376> has lain <WH7901> with you, <WH7847> and if you haven't gone aside to uncleanness, <WH2932> being under your husband, <WH376> be free <WH5352> from this water <WH4325> of bitterness <WH4751> that brings a curse. <WH779>

But if you have gone astray, <WH7847> being under your husband, <WH376> and if you are defiled, <WH2930> and some man <WH376> has <WH5414> lain <WH7903> with you besides <WH1107> your husband: <WH376>"

then the priest <WH3548> shall cause <WH7650> the woman <WH802> to swear with the oath <WH7621> of cursing, <WH423> and the priest <WH3548> shall tell <WH559> the woman, <WH802> "Yahweh <WH3068> make <WH5414> you a curse <WH423> and an oath <WH7621> among <WH8432> your people, <WH5971> when Yahweh <WH3068> allows <WH5414> your thigh <WH3409> to fall away, <WH5307> and your body <WH990> to swell; <WH6639>

and this water <WH4325> that brings a curse <WH779> will go <WH935> into your bowels, <WH4578> and make your body <WH990> swell, <WH6638> and your thigh <WH3409> fall away. <WH5307>" The woman <WH802> shall say, <WH559> "Amen, <WH543> Amen. <WH543>"
<WH3548>"'The priest shall write <WH3789> these curses <WH423> in a book, <WH5612> and he shall blot <WH4229> them out into the water <WH4325> of bitterness. <WH4751>

He shall make the woman <WH802> drink <WH8248> the water <WH4325> of bitterness <WH4751> that causes the curse; <WH779> and the water <WH4325> that causes the curse <WH779> shall enter <WH935> into her and become bitter. <WH4751>

The priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> the meal offering <WH4503> of jealousy <WH7068> out of the woman <WH802>'s hand, <WH3027> and shall wave <WH5130> the meal offering <WH4503> before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> and bring <WH7126> it to the altar. <WH4196>

The priest <WH3548> shall take a handful <WH7061> of the meal offering, <WH4503> as its memorial, <WH234> and burn <WH6999> it on the altar, <WH4196> and afterward <WH310> shall make the woman <WH802> drink <WH8248> the water. <WH4325>

When he has made her drink <WH8248> the water, <WH4325> then it shall happen, <WH2930> if she is defiled, and has committed <WH4603> a trespass <WH4604> against her husband, <WH376> that the water <WH4325> that causes the curse <WH779> will enter <WH935> into her and become bitter, <WH4751> and her body <WH990> will swell, <WH6638> and her thigh <WH3409> will fall away: <WH5307> and the woman <WH802> will be a curse <WH423> among <WH7130> her people. <WH5971>
If the woman <WH802> isn't <WH2930> defiled, but is clean; <WH2889> then she shall be free, <WH5352> and shall conceive <WH2232> seed. <WH2233>
<WH8451>"'This is the law of jealousy, <WH7068> when a wife, <WH802> being under her husband, <WH376> goes astray, <WH7847> and is defiled; <WH2930>

or when the spirit <WH7307> of jealousy <WH7068> comes <WH5674> on a man, <WH376> and he is jealous <WH7065> of his wife; <WH802> then he shall set <WH5975> the woman <WH802> before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> and the priest <WH3548> shall execute <WH6213> on her all this law. <WH8451>
The man <WH376> shall be free <WH5352> from iniquity, <WH5771> and that <WH1931> woman <WH802> shall bear <WH5375> her iniquity. <WH5771>'"
